tool.name: Trim Sequence by Quality

param.name: maxlen
param.label: Maximally trim read down to INT bp

tool.help:
** Read Quality Trimming Tool **
Trim low-quality bases from both end using Phred Algorithm
If paired-end reads, please process reads from each end separately and choose proper label (1 or 2) for each end
Please consult your sequencing facility about paired-end read label if you have trouble identify them
For details about this tool, please go to https://github.com/lh3/seqtk
